channel.title: vegan on Flo's Food and Drink

item.title: Vegan Soda Bread
item.description: Ingreidents 200g plain flour 150g wholemeal flour 50g oats (I use 20g oats + 30g of seed mix) & extra to sprinkle on top 1 teaspoon salt 1 teaspoon baking soda 300ml neutral tasting dairy free milk 1 tablespoon white wine vinegar or lemon juice Method Mix all dry ingredients together, then add milk (which has been curdled by previously adding white wine vinegar/lemon juice) 1lb loaf tin
